name: Alolan Ninetales

passive.name: Aurora Veil
passive.effect: Whenever you get rid of any Light Screen tokens, you may either draw a card or generate an Ice Energy into your hand.

attacks.name: Light Screen
attacks.effect: Create 5 Light Screen tokens. Reduce damage to your active Pokemon by 10 if there are any Light Screen tokens. At the end of your turn, get rid of a Light Screen Token.

attacks.name: Aurora Break
attacks.effect: This attack deals 10 damage times the number of your Light Screen tokens. Get rid of half of your Light Screen tokens, rounded up.

flavor: When the night sky glows with a radioactive rainbow, these snowy foxes spell doom for their foes.
